faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our services
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Still have questions? Feel free to get in touch with us today!

questions.question: How can I book a photography session?
questions.answer: You can book by contacting us directly through the website or via WhatsApp. We'll discuss the details with you and send you a booking confirmation within a short time.

questions.question: Do you provide aerial photography in all cities?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide aerial photography in most cities, but some areas may require additional permits according to local regulations. We help you verify these before shooting.

questions.question: How long does it take to deliver photos or videos after the session?
questions.answer: Usually photos are delivered within 3 to 5 business days, and videos within 7 to 10 days, depending on the project size and type of editing required.

questions.question: Can I request revisions after delivery?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We provide a certain number of free revisions according to the package, and if you need additional revisions, they can be calculated with nominal fees.

questions.question: Do you have ready photography packages or do you design custom ones?
questions.answer: We offer ready packages that suit most needs, but we can design a special package according to your idea and budget.

questions.question: Do I need to pay an advance for booking?
questions.answer: Yes, a deposit is paid to confirm the booking (usually 30% of the service value), and the rest upon delivery or before the shooting day.

questions.question: What type of equipment do you use?
questions.answer: We use professional equipment from the latest cameras and drones, and we always ensure image, sound, and lighting quality in every project.

questions.question: Do you provide event photography or just personal sessions?
questions.answer: We cover all types of photography: personal sessions, event photography, real estate, products, marketing content, and more.
